duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate assigned patients and plans, implements and documents nursing care.
Deliver excellent nursing care through evaluations, planning, implementation, and documentation while serving a diverse patient population with complex concerns.
Perform various patient tests and administers medications within the scope of practice of the registered nurse.
Promote patients' independence by establishing patient care goals and teaching patients and families to understand conditions, medications, and self-care skills.
Rely on experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited school of Nursing
PA Registered Nurse Temporary Practice Permit or Registered Nurse License
